Package ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.model.gamelogic.component.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.model.gamelogic.component.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class representing a Player in the game Player has a name, points, a hand of cards and other internal fields.
